description:
## Objective
The objective is to align the button properly in the title of the loan products page.

### Description

Problems:
1. The `padding` of the `edit` button is not been maintained well.  

Expected Behaviour:
1. The edit button should be aligned properly.

Links:
1. Project: https://github.com/openMF/community-app
2. Issue: https://github.com/openMF/community-app/issues/2729

## How to get help 
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/community-app) or mail me at [muskan.khedia2000@gmail.com](muskan.khedia2000@gmail.com)
name: Mifos X Community App: Edit button not aligned properly
